# Merchant (Trait)
## Overview
**Merchant**: You lived your life as a merchant, buying and selling goods. You gain a +1 trait bonus on any [[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]] and [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] checks you attempt while bargaining for the price of goods. [[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]] is always a class skill for you. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 60
